item.description: Our Guest Speaker for our Hartford Area Dinner in February will be Dan Finn, Director of Pioneer Valley Local First. Dan will tell us how consumers can strengthen their communities by buying local and will also talk about the growing Fair Trade movement. Join us on Tuesday, February 26 at the Wood-n-Tap restaurant at 12 Town Line Road in Rocky Hill. Drinks and socializing begin at 6:30 p.m. followed by dinner and our speaker at 7:00 p.m.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the private room - the host or hostess can show you the way.
item.name: Hartford Area Dinner Meeting - Buy Local/Fair Trade
